caller_intent: Jamie, an Alliance Insurance agent, needed to locate the NCRF 31 form for Ariel Bailey's policy (number 2021179090) to facilitate its signing and upload to the portal.
resolution_steps: Daniel confirmed the policy details (Ariel Bailey, policy number 2021179090, mod 02).
Daniel searched the system for the NCRF 31 form.
Daniel instructed Jamie to find the form on page 7 of the 'renew' packet under 'certification of higher coverage limit.'
Jamie confirmed understanding and planned to have the client sign and upload the form to the portal.
knowledge_required: Understanding of policy document structures (e.g., 'renew' packets, page numbers).
Familiarity with NCRF 31 form's purpose and location in policy documents.
summary: Jamie sought assistance locating the NCRF 31 form for a client's policy. Daniel guided Jamie to page 7 of the renew packet, where the form was found. Jamie will now have the client sign and upload it to the portal. The call concluded successfully with a clear resolution.
